addAdventure

public ReturnInfo addAdventure(com.hci.geotagger.Objects.Adventure a)
This method will add an Adventure record to the database. If the network is NOT available then the operation will be cached. TODO: Add caching of the operation.

addAdventureToServer

private JSONObject addAdventureToServer(com.hci.geotagger.Objects.Adventure a)
Add an Adventure to the server database INSERT INTO adventures(OwnerID, Name, Description) if successful, returns: array('AdventureID'=>$last_id, 'OwnerID'=>$uId, 'Name'=>$name, 'Description'=>$desc);
